title: SUM ACC UNTIL AC=5
code:
MOV 00, AC
ETI2 INC AC
CMP 05
BEQ ETI1
JMP ETI2
ETI1 FIN

title: SEARCH IN BUFFER FOR '05'
code:
MOV 01, D
MOV 02, E
MOV 05, AC
STAX

MOV 00, D
MOV FE, E
ETIS LDAX

CMP 05
BEQ ETIFIN

MOV E, AC
CMP FF
BEQ ETID
JMP ETIE

ETID INC D
ETIE INC E

JMP ETIS
ETIFIN FIN

title: CALL FUNCTION
code:
INISP 0123

MOV FF, D
MOV FA, E

MOV 10, AC
STAX

INC E
MOV 31, AC
STAX

INC E
MOV 42, AC
STAX

INC E
MOV C5, AC
STAX


MOV 02, B
MOV 02, C
CALL FFFA
FIN
